titles.title: To allow individuals to participate in voluntary prayer or a moment of silence in any public building supported in whole or in part through the expenditure of Federal funds.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Grants individuals the right to participate in voluntary prayer or a moment of silence in any public building supported in whole or in part through the expenditure of Federal funds.
